_header: Jesu Christ fulfilled of grace / In the temple up he raise
Note: For another text of this Gospel see 3297.
_description: Gospel, ‘In vigilia Sancte Trinitatis’, in the ‘expanded’ Northern Homily Cycle

BLHar4196.First Lines: Ihesus crist fulfild of graceIn þe temple vp he rase…
BLHar4196.Last Lines: …How men suld till goddes bidinges bowGod grant vs grace so forto trow
BLHar4196.Note: Preceded by Latin, “Surgens ihesu crist de synagoga.”
BLHar4196.Attributed Title: In vigilia Sancte trinitatis Secundum Lucam (rubric, f. 98vb)
BLHar4196.Editions:
Nevanlinna,  Sara. 
             The Northern Homily Cycle: The Expanded Version in MSS Harley 4196 and Cotton Tiberius E.vii.
             3 vols. 
             Memoires de la Societé Neophilologique de Helsinki.
         Helsinki. 38 (1972); 41 (1973); and 43 (1984): II. 242-245.
